string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (A-G) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Mover la pieza d\'e2 ta e4

resources.string: Ficar una torre en b4 (nomás en a variant Crazyhouse)

string.name: readOutClocks
string.comment:
readOutClocks
This is the help text for one of the possible keyboard commands. When this command is entered, the current clocks (player's remaining time) is read out loud. 'Read out' is used as a verb here.

resources.string: Si no conoixes la notación anterior, aprende mas aquí:
Incluye una \"x\" pa indicar que una captura ye opcional
Pueden usar-se tanto la letra \"o\" como lo dichito zero \"0\" pa enrocar

string.name: ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
string.comment:
ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
'Enter' as in the key on a standard keyboard.

resources.string: Si ye posible enrocar-se d\'as dos maneras, pretar enter pa fer enroque curto

string.name: capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
string.comment:
capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
Note: Piece letters (K, Q, R, B, N) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Las mayusclas nomás importan en situacions ambigas, pa distinguir un alfil (B) d\'o peón de b (b)
Pa fer un movimiento anticipau, nomás has d\'escribir-lo antes de que sía lo tuyo redolín
